pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ServiceFoundryServiceFoundry is a client library that allows you to containerize and deploy your Machine Learning model (or otherservices) to a managed Kubernetes Cluster. This also generates a Grafana cluster with complete visibility of yourService Health, System Logs, and Kubernetes Workspace.It is available both as a command-line-interface and via APIs that allow you to deploy directly from your JupyterNotebook.You can access the health of your service, monitoring links and deployed endpoints by logging on to TrueFoundry'sdashboard.# Installation```pip install -U servicefoundry```# Documentationhttps://docs.truefoundry.com/servicefoundry/
